title: Sitefinity to be Subscription only
content:
Turns out sitefinity community 3.7 SP2 was the last version to be free.  
[Sitefinity Forum Link](https://www.sitefinity.com/support/forums/sitefinity-3-x/general-discussions/community-edition-removed-from-site.aspx)  
  
### Update
Turns out Sitefinity 4 does indeed have a stripped down community edition

### Update 2020
Yeah no, there's no free edition of Sitefinity anymore, actually there's not really an affordable hobby tier.
seoDescription: Sitefinity has removed it's free community edition and is now only offering a paid subscription option.
